wikipedia_page.main: J. Martyn Chamberlain,  (born 1947) is a British experimental physicist and academic. Having taught at the University of Nottingham and the University of Leeds, he joined Durham University as Professor of Applied Physics in 2003. From 2003 to 2011, he was also the Master of Grey College at the university. He retired in 2011.

response: * Martyn Chamberlain – Emeritus Professor of Physics at Durham University; Master of Grey College (2003–2011)
Emeritus staff include, among others, Martyn Chamberlain, R. Keith Ellis, F. Richard Stephenson, and Brian Keith Tanner.
